pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer is the sixth most important cancer in the world, and its incidence in blacks has been on the increase. It is a very important cause of morbidity and mortality. In North-eastern Nigeria, reports on prostate cancer have been scarce. The aim of this paper is to highlight the clinico-pathological features and management of prostate cancer in north-eastern Nigeria.

metaData.source:
Detection and treatment of prostate cancer: perspective of the urologist
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7933229/
